summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Go to Top admin platform - all 14 sections working perfectly. Backend APIs 100% functional, frontend UI fully navigable with all CRUD operations available.
passed_tests: Dashboard with comprehensive stats (8 leads total, 7 new, 1 in progress, 8 today, 6 employees)

All 14 sidebar sections present and accessible: Dashboard, Leads/CRM, Block Constructor, Calculator, PDF Template, Referral Codes, Slot Counters, Footer, TG Messages, TG Bot, Scripts, Employees, Permissions, Settings
Calculator: Tab and service CRUD operations (create/read/update/delete)
Referrals: Complete CRUD with toggle active/inactive functionality
Slot Counters: Full CRUD operations for counter management
Scripts: CRUD operations with toggle active functionality
Telegram Messages: Complete message template CRUD
Footer Settings: Load and save with bilingual support (RU/AM)
PDF Template: Load and save functionality
Permissions: Comprehensive access management with all 14 sections visible
Backend API testing: 38/38 individual tests passed across all new sections
Frontend navigation: 8/8 tested sections fully accessible
Activity logging and recent activity display
